message: The next day, I'm so tired, I barely make it to work on time.
Mr. Haga heads out right after opening, leaving me and Junker alone in the store.
Business is slow, so I have plenty of time to think about what happened yesterday.

Noiz and Clear.
I still don't know what the deal is with either of them...
Though, to be honest, the house felt a little empty once they'd all left.
Like, it's nice to have something exciting happen once in a while...

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hum-Drum Junk. How may I help you?"
The caller hangs up without saying a word.
What was that? Some kind of prank call?
The door opens and a chorus of obnoxious voices tear through the shop.
They don't have an endearing bone in their scrawny little bodies...
Now their attention has shifted to Junker.
Junker screeches to a halt and tries to hide behind me.
Wait. Won't that make me their new target?
While struggling with the little imps, I hear the door open again.
Expecting a customer, I look up to see―
Noiz looks around the shop curiously as he approaches.
The fiends let go of me to get a look at Noiz.

name: ミオ
message: "Hey, wait a sec! Since when do you get customers?"
Before I can stop them, the brats charge Noiz.
Kio and Nao stumble forward. And Mio...
Noiz catches her just before she bumps into him and lifts her up like a kitten.

name: ミオ
message: "Lemme go! What do you think you doing?!"
Mio pounds on Noiz's chest, to no effect. He just stares at her.
The sight is kind of surreal.
And then, as I watch in disbelief, Noiz does something completely unexpected.
He takes Mio's hand, brings it to his lips, and kisses it.
Mio is even more shocked than I am. I mean, of course she would be.
Her face turns bright red and she starts trembling.

name: ノイズ
message: "Violence isn't an attractive trait for a girl."
Mio's mouth flaps aimlessly for a moment, but then she closes her eyes tightly, takes a deep breath...
Noiz puts Mio down without reacting.
She immediately darts away, pointing at him once she reaches a safe distance.

name: ミオ
message: "What are you gonna do if you start bleeding with all those holes in your face?!"
Kio and Nao were lying on the ground, pretending to be injured after their falls, but they jump up immediately upon hearing their sister's comment.
Fortunately, it seems like her brothers didn't catch Noiz's little performance there. That's a relief.
Mio quickly waves them off. Her face is still bright red.
Mio bolts out of the store, screaming. Her brothers quickly follow.
